channel.title: Okay i've got my server running, but now i can't connect to it. :S
channel.description:
Finally the server works and after it started i thought, well it's all done right? Wrong! I ran the HD client and the server said reicived connection from 127.0.0.1. Then the load bar stops and it says error_game_js5io and thats it.. nothing. :/ It seems everything that can go wrong with setting up a server has gone wrong. But after this has been fixed it'll probs work. :D
Also if someone could tell me how to post pictures on here then i'd show you.

item.title: Okay i've got my server running, but now i can't connect to it. :S
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Use your ip address to connect to it.

Read full topic

item.title: Okay i've got my server running, but now i can't connect to it. :S
item.dc:creator: @The_Flying_E The Flying E
item.description:
@The_Flying_E wrote:

well atm i don’t have a no ip it expired due to in activity but i don’t see why it doesn’t work… the server is in the same pc im using the client on :/[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 31, 2009, 10:47:06 pm[/size][hr]I heard it’s something to do with the cache i never set. but i don’t know.

Read full topic

127.0.0.1 And Then on your client let people use your no-ip.
